page.title: 18Newbold Rugger Club
page.content: The local Rugby Union club is situated in the village near the River Avon.It has a{large clubhouse}with a gymnasium on top.There are{three pitches}with a training ground. Four teams compete throughout the Midland region and the first team is one of the top junior clubs in Warwickshire.In 1972 they won the {Warwickshire Cup.} There is a{colts team}but you have to be 15 years of age to join.Some of the better players have played for England Colts. Many{social}events take place in the club house which was modernised in 1960.These include discos, weddings, and Bingo.During the summer months, the field is used for cricket and pre- season training for all players.
